storyInfo: Gladiia proves the innocence of the Abyssal Hunters with the help of their former technical advisor Blandus, but suspicions around Ulpianus remain.

attributes.content: Consul Gladiia, is it in your opinion that the issue does not lie with the battle itself?
attributes.name: Legion Commander

attributes.content: Correct. What you see before you is a projection of the battle plan. If anyone here notices a flaw I haven't, I'd expect it to be pointed out.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: No, I have no objections to the battle plan. It was the most suitable one, given what we knew at the time.
attributes.name: Legion Commander

attributes.content: However, I would like your opinion on what we knew at the time.
attributes.name: Legion Commander

attributes.content: I have to admit that Ã†gir's knowledge of the Seaborn back then was deeply flawed. As such...
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: What are they trying to say?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Still not used to their way of thinking, are you? You never did like thinking much, even back home.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: They mean no ill will. They're simply seeking the truth they need.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Identify every flaw and question all perfections. The most heated debates will uncover truth in its full beauty and reveal the right way forward.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Just leave it to Swordfish.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: If you don't want to listen, just take a nap.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: ...In conclusion, our greatest error when designing the warfare five years ago was failing to make allowance for flaws in our knowledge.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Until every last truth of Terra is revealed, we must admit that our understanding of the Seaborn will remain flawed. Our warfare design must reflect this revelation.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I concur. Your conclusion should be incorporated into our future battle plans.
attributes.name: Legion Commander

attributes.content: It has been an honor to reflect upon this critical battle and reach a fruitful conclusion with you.
attributes.name: Legion Commander

attributes.content: That said, the battle five years ago is not our only concern.
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: We have more pressing issues to worry about.
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: Your physical examination has revealed mutations that cannot be ignored. The same goes for Skadi and Laurentina.
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: I do not doubt your loyalty, but we need to know how assimilation by Seaborn genes will affect your behavior.
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: Apologies for my candor.
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: Milliarium will soon identify the locations of the remaining nests. Then, the Seaborn will be driven out by Class IV weapons, opening up a Waterway.
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: Is there any possibility that the Abyssal Hunters will become an enemy of Ã†gir, and of yourselves?
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: Hunters out of control pose a greater risk to Ã†gir than the Seaborn.
The Abyssal Hunters are the flipside of Ã†gir. Created in Ã†gir's most despicable attempt at salvation, they are now both feared and pitied by their creators.

attributes.options: Shouldn't you be down there too?

attributes.content: You're much calmer than I expected. And you know who I am.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: It seems Gladiia has built a relationship on land with more than just the one doctor.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I've never seen you in any of the operations. You're not an Inquisitor, nor an Islander.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The doctor from Rhodes Island brought you to Ã†gir, but kept your identity a secret.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: I'm just Kal'tsit's colleague.;I'm also from Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: You may introduce yourself however you like.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: However, the point is that you can help the Hunters.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: Why don't you just go to Skadi?;Why don't you just go to Specter?;Why don't you just go to Gladiia?

attributes.content: This is not her forte.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You mean Laurentina?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: This is not her forte.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Now is not the time.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: On the contrary. I do trust them. But I also know them all too well.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Skadi acts before thinking. Laurentina has not been lucid for long. Gladiia will inevitably be the one to make decisions.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I've already shared much of what I know with her. She should be on guard. She knows the potential restrictions, but nevertheless decided to return to Ã†gir.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Overeager to return to a familiar environment, she is oblivious to the fact that she has placed herself in the spotlight, where all that can and cannot be trusted have the power to scrutinize her.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Now is not the best time for the Abyssal Hunters to come home. Their decision is a big gamble.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: Why did you sneak into the city, then?;Sounds like you care about them, after all.

attributes.content: Gladiia and the others are not in a good situation.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: They underwent modifications, but unlike me, they were not part of the Abyssal Hunter project's core research. Explaining the changes in their bodies will be difficult for them.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I'll pass on some information to you, and I'll need you to help Gladiia if necessary. Convey my warning to her later.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: As for the restâ€”
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: May I say I few things?
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: ...Blandus. He's here too?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Blandus?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Isn't this just like the old days? You and Ulpianus used to get into arguments with the research staff while I was napping.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Your comments would be much appreciated, Advisor.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: You flatter me, Consul.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: I was the technical advisor for the Abyssal Hunter project, responsible for the gene splicing research used in the modification process.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: In other words, at this exact moment and in this exact place, I am the leading authority on Abyssal Hunters.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Gladiia, Laurentina, and Skadi have been fighting on dry land too frequently and for too long. It is indeed cause for concern regarding their physical condition.
attributes.name: Blandus
Blandus
attributes.content: As such, your concerns are not without reason. But my answer is this:

attributes.name: Blandus
attributes.content: Noâ€”
They will not become Seaborn.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: The hall goes silent.
Blandus clears his throat.
Let me try to explain this in layman's terms.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Under ordinary circumstances, Seaborn genes exhibit abnormal dominance and will irreversibly overwrite any preexisting traits in their host.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: In Abyssal Hunters, however, we have managed to extend the timeline of this process until it far exceeds the natural lifespan of any given Hunter.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Furthermore, the Academy of Technology made a critical breakthrough, allowing us to implant an 'auto-adaptive junction' in all the Hunters before their deployment to eradicate the Firstborn.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: The auto-adaptive junction was implanted at the splice point between human and Seaborn DNA to assist the Hunters in more closely monitoring their Seaborn genes.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: If the Seaborn genes exhibited abnormal dominance, the junction would signal the body to resist their attempt at taking over.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: While there has undoubtedly been some degree of decay of their auto-adaptive junctions after five years without maintenance, the changes they've undergone remain well within acceptable ranges.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: So you say, Advisor, but there is a record of a failed auto-adaptive junction surgery in the Abyssal Hunter Lab archives.
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: ...That was Ulpianus.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: The archives should also note that multiple clinical trials have demonstrated that the incident did not produce any adverse effects.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: For this, I gladly take full responsibility and will answer any queries.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Now that the Abyssal Hunters have returned to Ã†gir, their condition will be under control.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: Am I to infer that you already have an effective means to contain their mutation?
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: There is an Abyssal Hunter Lab in the city we can reactivate. I will personally perform maintenance on their auto-adaptive junctions.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: What of Ulpianus?
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: How can we be sure that the Hunter who has refused to return to Ã†gir will not become Seaborn?
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.content: Or that what we fear hasn't already happened?
attributes.name: Academy of Science Researcher

attributes.options: Sounds like you've just become the target.;Sounds like you're pretty dangerous.

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: It's only natural they would be skeptical.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: It is both human nature and a hard-learned lesson to be wary of what you cannot control.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.options: They're not the only ones suspicious of you.;I'm equally curious about your motivations.
Did you really come out of concern for the Hunters?

attributes.content: Before the sinking of the Stultifera, I shared my discovery with Gladiia: there is more than one entity like Ishar'mla amongst the Seaborn, those known as Firstborn.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The Firstborn are stirring. It, or rather They, are about to awaken.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I don't know how many or how soon... but it's close. Too close.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: This is why the Seaborn have begun migrating towards land. I've ventured into many nests recently, and as a whole, they are feeling a sense of crisis.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Perhaps not even the ocean contains enough nourishment for the awakening of a new god. Will it become another Profound Silence for the land, or another calamity for the seas?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The great migration almost perfectly coincides with Ã†gir's Waterway Program. One can only speculate about Milliarium's role in all this.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Is that not reason enough for me to visit this city?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: The Seaborn have proliferated independently, driven by their instincts. But they came from the Firstborn, and cannot defy their fundamental nature.
attributes.name: Academy of Technology Researcher

attributes.content: In other words, even if the death of the Firstborn failed to halt their evolution, it should not have caused the rapid emergence of new, previously undocumented traits.
attributes.name: Academy of Technology Researcher

attributes.content: I believe I already addressed that in my report.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Yes, the Multiple Firstborn hypothesis. A logical enough explanation, but that is exactly why I am skeptical of Ulpianus.
attributes.name: Academy of Technology Researcher

attributes.content: Our well-laid plans ended in failure. The three surviving Hunters washed ashore on unfamiliar land, before being reunited with the Hunter who was last to leave the nest.
attributes.name: Academy of Technology Researcher

attributes.content: The information Ulpianus broughtâ€”that there are more than one Firstborn in the oceanâ€”is more than shocking, it's highly 'effective.'
attributes.name: Academy of Technology Researcher

attributes.content: Effective in explaining why the Seaborn's actions have become more disruptive despite your success with the mission objective. Effective in addressing all our questions.
attributes.name: Academy of Technology Researcher

attributes.content: And why does that make you skeptical?
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: Because it's an answer so perfect that it's either the incontrovertible truth, or was designed specifically to put our questions to rest.
attributes.name: Academy of Technology Researcher

attributes.content: Whether or not to believe the information he gave you will have an enormous impact on our warfare design.
attributes.name: Academy of Technology Researcher

attributes.content: If Ulpianus lives, then the most effective way to verify his claims would be to track him down, perhaps even question him directly.
attributes.name: Academy of Technology Researcher

attributes.content: You have been quiet, Advisor Blandus.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Do you have anything to add regarding Ulpianus?
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: You were once students under the same mentor, and it was your trust in him that led you to join the Abyssal Hunter project despite your reservations.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: But I also trust your knowledge and ethics as an Ã†gir. You need not recuse yourself.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: All I can say, Madame Consul, is that I can be accountable for every word I say here at this tribunal.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: I will not intentionally put forward a hypothesis in his favor, nor will I make any conjectures that could hurt him.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.content: That is all.
attributes.name: Blandus

attributes.options: Sounds like you two are pretty close.;I guess even a loner has friends.

attributes.content: Ulpianus does not answer. The questioning continues, but Blandus says no more. Suddenly, he looks up towards you, as though he's sensed something.
You meet his weary gaze across the length of the Sophontheatrum.
He seems to have noticed something. The consul next to him and several other Ã†gir catch that peculiar moment, and some of them follow his gaze.
You look to your side and find the seat empty.

attributes.options: Don't mind me. Just a landlubber here to watch.;Sorry, am I interrupting?;Do I need to speak?

attributes.content: The tribunal has arrived at an adequate conclusion.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Gladiia, Skadi, Laurentina, and the rest of the Abyssal Hunters have made tremendous sacrifices and contributions to Ã†gir.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: It is a blessing for Ã†gir that new ideas continue to emerge from their knowledge and experience even after five years.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: They have demonstrated that they are both innocent and safe, and that their return at this stage of the Waterway Program is not a threat, but a reassurance.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Yet now our attention turns to another of the surviving Hunters, Ulpianus.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: He has concealed his movements for reasons unknown, and has attempted to influence the other Hunters. Both actions clearly contravene his duty.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Based on our present information, we are unable to determine his motives, goals, or even whether he still qualifies as Ã†gir.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Ulpianus must be found. If his intentions are indeed benign, as Gladiia claims, our suspicions must be cleared through proper questioning.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Those whose questions have been answered may now leave. Those whose questions have not may continue their inquiries.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Do you have anything to add, Consul Gladiia?
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The coral-shaped terminal at the center of the Sophontheatrum slowly closes and sinks into the ground. The space is now flat and empty, like a stage ready for a new play.
Gladiia stands alone on it.
I have told you all I know.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: I have no objections to the tribunal's conclusion, nor to the suspicions cast upon Ulpianus.
attributes.name: Gladiia

attributes.content: People begin to file out, many turning to nod towards Gladiia as they reach the exit.
The remaining audience continue to ask questions, and Gladiia responds to each one, whether she is able to answer or not.
The water caustics cast by the dome weave a picture of light and shadow with the ring of light surrounding the space, dancing on Gladiia's expressionless face.
Even as an Ã†gir, I find this hard to understand sometimes.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: They fling words at her like spears one moment, then thank her for her contributions the next.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: They're sincere, you know. Science requires people to separate facts from feelings, and they're good at it.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I know. I'm just... *sigh* Never mind.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: As for Captain Ulpianus, all they have are suspicions. Swordfish, the Doctor, Kal'tsit... someone will think of a way.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: What next?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: We wait for Swordfish. Which, unfortunately, will take a while. *sigh*...
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: You're sighing too?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: She used to visit the Sophontheatrum to watch plays whenever there wasn't a mission. Sometimes I went with her.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Captain Gladiia...
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: She's fairly well-versed in the arts. Her mother's influence, supposedly.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Unlike everyone else, however, she liked the highest, furthest seats, so I would always end up having to sit apart from her.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: For her, keeping the distance helps filter out the noise. Ignoring some of the finer details makes it easier for her to fully immerse herself in the story.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Right now, though, she's the one at center stage.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Sheâ€™s lost her accustomed sense of distance, becoming the subject of judgment, scrutiny, and discussion. No one in her position can remain unperturbed.
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: I'm starting to get why I sighed.
attributes.name: Skadi

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Specter

attributes.content: Because only now does it really feel like we're back.
attributes.name: Skadi
